name: Monste'mon
description:
Monste'mon is a 2d Pokemon like game, but in the monster hunter world. To play you explore the world searching in grass for monsters.during a battle you can heal, attack, swap monsters, or tame the opponent. healing requires 1 meat, witch will be acquired during battle. attacking deals damage to you and your enemy. when the enemy's health is low you have a high chance to capture it. switching monsters will change your current monster with one in your infinite sized team. after switching monsters, you will no longer be able to tame. a little star picture will show up if you already caught the monster.

this game was designed with mobile devices in mind, so all the controls are touch (Mouse works to)
